titles.title: Alpena, Michigan, Community Based Outpatient Clinic Act of 2006
To require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to establish and operate a community-based outpatient clinic in Alpena, Michigan.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
6/26/2006--Introduced. Alpena, Michigan, Community Based Outpatient Clinic Act of 2006 - Directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to establish and operate a community-based outpatient clinic for veterans at a location selected by the Secretary in Alpena, Michigan.
Requires clinic operation within one year after the enactment of this Act.
